body:
For the packaging scripts you can add the following block to the mod.yamls:

``` yaml
RequiresMods:
    modchooser: {DEV_VERSION}
```

and then change the makefile's version rule to:

``` bash
version: mods/ra/mod.yaml mods/cnc/mod.yaml mods/d2k/mod.yaml mods/ts/mod.yaml mods/modchooser/mod.yaml mods/all/mod.yaml
    @for i in $? ; do \
        awk '{sub("Version:.*$$","Version: $(VERSION)"); print $0}' $${i} > $${i}.tmp && \
        awk '{sub("\tmodchooser:.*$$","\tmodchooser: $(VERSION)"); print $0}' $${i}.tmp > $${i} ; \
    done
```
Updated both the Makefile and make.ps1 to change the target version.

We probably also want a `IsModInstalled` check inside of `CheckMod`.

Other than that. :+1:

> We probably also want a  IsModInstalled  check inside of  CheckMod .

Ok scratch that, i forgot about:

```
17:00:49 (pchote) abcdefg30: we already support that
17:00:57 (abcdefg30) ? what
17:00:58 (pchote) you just specify the other mod's contents in your own mod content check
17:01:17 (Phroh|work) pchote: Won't that require duplicate files?
17:01:20 (pchote) no
17:01:22 (Phroh|work) ie a mix in ra2/ and yr/
17:01:29 (pchote) you can reference from the other mods dir
17:01:34 (abcdefg30) ah hm, so #9463 is only about the yaml of the other mod?
17:01:45 (pchote) the actual mod files, yeah
17:01:50 (pchote) yaml and other non-content
```

`make version` leaves:

``` yaml
RequiresMods:
    modchooser: {DEV_VERSION}
```

diff:

``` diff
diff --git a/mods/all/mod.yaml b/mods/all/mod.yaml

-   Version: {DEV_VERSION}

    Hidden: true
    Description: Depending on all DLLs.

index c917208..5487bd1 100644

+++ b/mods/cnc/mod.yaml
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@

    Title: Tiberian Dawn
    Description: Join the Global Defense Initiative or the Brotherhood of Nod in our\nrecreation of the classic game that started it all.\n\nTiberian Dawn modernizes the original Command & Conquer gameplay\nby introducing features from later games, including per-factory\nproduction queues, unit veterancy, and capturable tech structures.
-   Version: {DEV_VERSION}
+   Version: git-c8d4d71
    Author: the OpenRA Developers

 RequiresMods:

+++ b/mods/d2k/mod.yaml

    Description: Three great houses fight for the precious spice, melange.\nHe who controls the spice controls the universe!\n\nTry to establish a foothold on the desert planet Arrakis\nwith its harsh environmental conditions and protect your\nharvesting operations from giant sandworms as well as\nruthless enemy factions.
-   Version: {DEV_VERSION}
+   Version: git-c8d4d71
    Author: the OpenRA Developers

 RequiresMods:
diff --git a/mods/modchooser/mod.yaml b/mods/modchooser/mod.yaml
index 1af5f13..1bdf50b 100644
--- a/mods/modchooser/mod.yaml
+++ b/mods/modchooser/mod.yaml
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 Metadata:
    Title: Mod Chooser

+   Version: git-c8d4d71
    Author: The OpenRA Developers
    Hidden: true

diff --git a/mods/ra/mod.yaml b/mods/ra/mod.yaml
index f4237bf..278de82 100644
--- a/mods/ra/mod.yaml
+++ b/mods/ra/mod.yaml
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 Metadata:
    Title: Red Alert
    Description: In a world where Hitler was assassinated and the Third Reich never\nexisted, the Soviet Union seeks power over all of Europe.  Allied\nagainst this Evil Empire, the free world faces a Cold War turned hot.\n\nRed Alert fuses the quick and fun gameplay of the original\nC&C: Red Alert, with balance improvements and new gameplay\nfeatures inspired by modern RTS games.
-   Version: {DEV_VERSION}
+   Version: git-c8d4d71
    Author: the OpenRA Developers

 RequiresMods:
diff --git a/mods/ts/mod.yaml b/mods/ts/mod.yaml
index 6b0325e..61b2911 100644
--- a/mods/ts/mod.yaml
+++ b/mods/ts/mod.yaml
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 Metadata:
    Title: Tiberian Sun
    Description: Developer stub, not yet ready for release!
-   Version: {DEV_VERSION}
+   Version: git-c8d4d71
    Author: the OpenRA Developers

 RequiresMods:
```
So the Makefile change doesn't work? Would be great if someone who actually knows what to do with it could take a look, because I can't test that one.

Fix the Makefile with this:

``` diff
diff --git a/Makefile b/Makefile
index e66b533..c6076b8 100644
--- a/Makefile
+++ b/Makefile
@@ -321,7 +321,6 @@ version: mods/ra/mod.yaml mods/cnc/mod.yaml mods/d2k/mod.yaml mods/ts/mod.yaml m
        @for i in $? ; do \
                awk '{sub("Version:.*$$","Version: $(VERSION)"); print $0}' $${i} > $${i}.tmp && \
                awk '{sub("\tmodchooser:.*$$","\tmodchooser: $(VERSION)"); print $0}' $${i}.tmp > $${i} ; \
-               mv -f $${i}.tmp $${i} ; \
        done

 docs: utility mods version
```

From my understanding TS shouldn't launch, but it does:

``` yaml
Metadata:
    Title: Tiberian Sun
    Description: Developer stub, not yet ready for release!
    Version: git-36cc25b
    Author: the OpenRA Developers

RequiresMods:
    modchooser: git-36cc25b
```

``` yaml
Metadata:
    Title: Mod Chooser
    Version: git-36cc25b-foo
    Author: The OpenRA Developers
    Hidden: true

RequiresMods:

```

Clicked `Install Mod` from TS when using the above yaml.

Travis is simply erroring on the commented-out code:

``` make
Checking for code style violations in OpenRA.Mods.Common...

OpenRA.Mods.Common/Widgets/Logic/ModBrowserLogic.cs:L206: [SA1005] The comment must start with a single space. To ignore this error when commenting out a line of code, begin the comment with '////' rather than '//'.

OpenRA.Mods.Common/Widgets/Logic/ModBrowserLogic.cs:L207: [SA1005] The comment must start with a single space. To ignore this error when commenting out a line of code, begin the comment with '////' rather than '//'.

OpenRA.Mods.Common/Widgets/Logic/ModBrowserLogic.cs:L211: [SA1005] The comment must start with a single space. To ignore this error when commenting out a line of code, begin the comment with '////' rather than '//'.

make: *** [check] Error 1
```

A nit that is _not_ a required fix for my :+1::

We should not list mods that are versioned correctly.

``` yaml
Metadata:
    Title: Mod Chooser
    Version: git-71d35a4
    Author: The OpenRA Developers
    Hidden: true

RequiresMods:
```

``` yaml
Metadata:
    Title: Tiberian Sun
    Description: Developer stub, not yet ready for release!
    Version: git-71d35a4
    Author: the OpenRA Developers

RequiresMods:
    modchooser: git-71d35a4
    ra: git-71d35a4-foo
```

![screen shot 2015-11-01 at 2 28 15 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4861023/10871163/d7d62f3e-80a4-11e5-98ef-8d4463e8a6f4.png)

Great job on this!
My tests are satisfied and I can't find any other ways to break this. :+1:
